title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Technology Integration Strategies in Elementary English Education—A Teacher-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary education and English language teaching
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will design a lesson plan for one topic following a 5-stage instructional framework (goal setting → content development → assessment tool application → feedback collection → improvement strategy derivation) using ≥3 digital tools suitable for teacher-centered instruction (Google Slides, Kahoot!, etc.), achieving ≥80% fulfillment rate in peer review and instructor evaluation.
Acquisition and application of basic technical skills for developing technology-based instructional materials.
Analysis of the impact of teacher-led technology utilization strategies on motivating elementary English learners.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
